name: Vinit Raj Singh
headline: Google Cloud Arcade Facilitator'2025 | CSE'27 | Student at DIT UNIVERSITY
about:
Hello! I’m Vinit — a Full-Stack SaaS Developer who loves combining software engineering with AI to build smart, automated, and user-friendly products.I focus on end-to-end SaaS development including architecture, APIs, databases, authentication, cloud deployment, and AI-based features like chatbots, document intelligence, and workflow automation. I enjoy building products that don’t just work — but feel intuitive, modern, and impactful.My goal is to keep innovating with AI and contribute to products that help businesses scale faster with automation.Hello! I’m Vinit — a Full-Stack SaaS Developer who loves combining software engineering with AI to build smart, automated, and user-friendly products.

I focus on end-to-end SaaS development including architecture, APIs, databases, authentication, cloud deployment, and AI-based features like chatbots, document intelligence, and workflow automation. I enjoy building products that don’t just work — but feel intuitive, modern, and impactful.

My goal is to keep innovating with AI and contribute to products that help businesses scale faster with automation.
